Name: Tulip Cocktail
Ingredients: 30 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
15 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Rich but balanced with bags of fruit: apple, apricot and lemon.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock 's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Tulip Cocktail contains 154 calories
